column1: While the matter was pending before this Court, the original Plaintiff  had passed away and her
daughter was substituted as the Substituted-Plaintiff-Respondent of this case. It appears that the
parties to the instant action had executed a Conditional Transfer and thereafter had entered into a

column2: the  Debt  Conciliation  Board  upon  an  application  made  by

column1: [Appellant], which varied the original terms and conditions of the said Conditional Transfer.
